Kuźnica Warężyńska () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Siewierz, within Będzin County, Silesian Voivodeship, in southern Poland. It lies approximately  south-west of Siewierz,  north-east of Będzin, and  north-east of the regional capital Katowice.
